filters

Class WeightFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • filters.WeightFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PostFilter

    public class WeightFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements PostFilter
    This filter prioritize messages using a weight system. Each group (hashtags, profiles, keywords, rnp, tools, urls) is associated a weight to increase the relevance of an analyzed message.
    WEIGHT (WT) means:
    WT 1 - normal term, it is not computed
    WT 2 - important terms
    WT 3 - very important terms
    WT 4 - High probability of threat
    Author:
    Rafael Silv√©rio Amaral
